Text: I was looking for this, thanks.

A great classic and a great actor in the form of Robert Preston.

Many thanks for sharing this.

One I must get on DVD on of these days.

This is pretty bad quality, especially for being twice the size of a normal DVDrip.
There's digital artifacts and ghosting all over the place.
No offense to the uploader, but don't bother downloading this - you'll be disappointed if you do.
Not the best quality, especially if you blow it up to full screen where it's more noticeable.  But it's the best quality one I've found and it's nice to see the movie again.
